webscript.shortname: Report - Content by type in folder
webscript.description:
Content search, filtered by type. Retrieve recursively all content in a folder using CMIS query.

Example:
http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/eu/gius/alfresco/reports/content/getContentByTypeInFolder?folderNodeRef=workspace://SpacesStore/560cb0c3-6991-401e-a85c-b7d16ad11f76&type=foo:invoiceName
